thread.title: Very good hotel located beside most major attractions.
thread.title_full: Very good hotel located beside most major attractions. - Review of The Manhattan at Times Square Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Graham K
title: Very good hotel located beside most major attractions.
text: I had a very good stay in this hotel,it was my 1st visit to new York and it was great to stay in a hotel beside most major attractions like times square,empire state, rockafeller and Broadway...also a 2 minute walk from the tubes down to ground zero and statue of liberty....a women called Linda at reception was very welcoming and friendly and William on the food counter was very nice and very friendly...the only flaw I had with the hotel is that the halls and rooms are a little dated and could do with new carpets and some painting but that been said it is a very clean,warm and dry hotel with comfortable rooms.
